1.content:
"I'm telling you Ethan! I grabbed it form grandma's closet. I don't know why she ripped this page from my spell book." Benny said to the teen standing in front of him with an unsure look in his face.

"Benny, if your grandma took this from you is because she knows how bad it can be. I don't know if we should try this." Ethan commented but he knew how stubborn Benny was. "And you said there is no way to revert this. If something goes wrong..."

"Dude, I'm just gonna shoot something randomly. Like one of Jane's dolls." Benny knew how to persuade Ethan and he got it. Ethan nodded in response knowing he would regret allowing Benny doing this.

"Fine just shoot that fly." Ethan pointed to the flying insect and Benny said the words. A blue lightning went across the room, swerved the fly and went right into Ethan's chest, making him fall on the floor. "Ouch!"

"I'm sorry man. I don't know what happened. Are you feeling anything different?" Benny helped Ethan getting on his feet, not sure of what his friend can turn into.

"I'm okay, I guess. I told you this was no good." Ethan said worried.

"I think it was nothing. C'mon, let's hang out a bit, so you can relax a little." Benny oferred and Ethan nodded again.

While they were walking,...
1.title: I Cast A Spell On You

choices: His Muscles Vanish, But Grow Again In Another Place
11.content:
"See, I told you nothing bad would happen." Benny said as they walked down the street going nowhere specifically.

"I don't know Benny, I'm not feeling very well ." Ethan replied holding his stomach just like he was about to puke. "I think we should go back to my place."

"Just a sec, dude. I have to lace my shoes." The young wizard knelt down on the floor. While Ethan waited, he could see Kurt coming closer. And the guy seemed mad. In fact, Kurt wanted revenge since he lost that wrestling match for him.

"I think you know why I'm here Morgan. And there's no way for you to runaway." Kurt grabbed Ethan by the collar of his shirt and lifted the smaller boy one feet from the floor.

Ethan's nausea got worse and he felt all his muscles contract and relax. The strange part was that they kept as the same size as when they were contracted. Benny soon realized the clear change in his friend's body and gasped in surprise. Before any of the three was able to say something, Ethan's muscles contracted again and again. Ethann was growing before their eyes. To adjust his growth, Ethan grew in height, which made his feet land on the floor, standing taller than Kurt. Ethan's arms grew so big that looked like they would burst at any moment. His pecs pushed his shirt forward and grew towards his face blocking his underside view. His traps engulfed his growing neck and pulled his shirt up till his stomach which now revealed an powerful eight pack. His back was so wide as Benny with open arms. There were no room in his jeans for his expanding quads. They were enormous as Kurt's waist. And his calves looked like soccer balls implanted to the back of his legs. Finally, his shoes exploded because it couldn't bear the massive feet that now touched the concrete.

"Dude, you're the incredible hulk! At least, without the green part." Benny joked amazed with the size of his best friend. Ethan was now taller than him. One thing that previously was the opposite.

"No. That's impossible." Kurt said scared of what kind muscle beast Ethan turned himself into. He decided to run before Ethan could do anything to his now hulked form.

"Benny, what did you do? Now I look like a freak!" Ethan said and felt that nausea coming up again. Right then...

Then, just as quickly as all his muscles grew to gigantic proportions, they deflated just as quickly, like balloons which let the air out of them.

"Ohh... Is it over? Hey... I'm normal! I feel normal again!" Ethan realized.

"Yeah... That was so weird..."

1122.content:
"Man, let me get out of these clothes..." Ethan groaned, as he frantically began removing his torn jeans and his ripped t-shirt.

"Why? What are you doing?" Benny asked Ethan.

"Dude! I already ripped my clothes last time I grew! I don't want to rip them any MORE!"

Ethan removed his shirt and jeans, leaving him wearing just his boxers. Benny got him a pair of stretchy Spandex and a loose tank top to wear instead.

"Dude! I'm feeling this constant tingling feeling in my legs..." he said.

Then, out of nowhere, Ethan's calves began to bulge! Both of them, on both legs, at the same time! Both calf muscles hardened and began to grow, pushing outward from the back of his legs, just below his knees!

"Ohhh... I feel it..." Ethan groaned.

"Your calves! They're getting huge!" Benny noticed.

Indeed, his calves were growing and they weren't stopping yet! They inflated bigger and bigger, becoming bigger than softballs. They were like two large spheres of muscle, sticking out from his legs, hard as rocks! But, they kept on growing. They became like soccer balls, big and round and heavy, packing on muscle and making Ethan feel the strength in his legs!

"Dude! I feel... freaking strong... in my legs!" he moaned.

His calves slowed down as they bulged out, like two large slabs of steel. They formed veins over them, as they were bigger than soccer balls, making Ethan's legs feel like rocket boosters.

"I need to... go outside..." Ethan groaned....

He shuffled his legs outside, trying not to take a single step. Once outside, he tried to walk, but ended up soaring into the air, due to his monster calves!

"Liftoff!" Benny laughed, as he saw Ethan leap 10 feet into the air.

KKKKKRRRRRRRRR! was the sound of bones cracking and clothes tearing at the same time!

"Benny were in the school not to mention our home town if I did grow really really big I'd most likely crush it killing everyone including you" "Oh, I forget about that small detail" "I thought you might have" Ethan shook his head at his friend and couldn't help but laugh. At first he was slightly miffed at Benny casting the spell on him. But now with these special perks he could live with Benny's mistakes. They had arrived at the classroom were Jane was as it was the only one locked plus Jane was yelling for help. Ethan grabbed the door handle and tore the door off it's hinges. "Thanks Sarah" Jane said. "Sarah's not here"Benny told her. "So Rory or Erica then" she was looking around for the vampires but only saw her older brother holding a broken door. "Are you saying Ethan ripped the door right off" "Well I didn't do it" Benny said.The three of them returned home. Jane went up to her room while the two boys remained outside.
123111222.title: Saving Jane

1231112222.content: Ethan was glad that Jane was safe at home. He needed to reset before he went up to his room, or he would fall through his floor. "Benny stand back I'm going to grow back." Benny stood back as Ethan grew back to twenty feet. "That is still so awesome" Benny commented. Ethan smiled down at his once again smaller friend. Stooping down to pick him up. "Hey why did you pick me up" Benny smacked Ethan's hand. "I like carrying you it's fun" "you're not going to climb a skyscraper are you" Benny looked up at Ethan. "No" Ethan shook his head. "Good" Benny said. Ethan was just standing holding his friend when they both heard a scream. Looking up or in Ethan's case just a bit down they saw Jane at her window screaming. "Put me down" Benny yelled up to Ethan. He placed him on the ground. As soon as his feet were on the ground he ran into the house and up to Jane's room. "Why is Ethan a giant" the little girl demanded. Benny scratched his head trying to avoid eye contact with her. "Benny what's happening" "I hit Ethan with a spell accidentally and now he can grow into a giant" He explained. "Can he go back to normal" "Sure" Benny went to the window opening it up. "Is she alright" Ethan asked?" "Seems to be yet she wants you to go norm" Benny said. "Fine " Ethan sighed as he shrank back to normal. He came inside the house and up the stairs. "Are you completely normal" Benny asked his friend? Instead of answering Ethan ran and jumped causing the spell master to raise his arms to catch him. They both crashed to the floor in a heap. "Why did you jump me"Benny moaned. "To show you if I was still like before I would have crushed you" "Not to mention you would have fallen through the floor" They both got up from the floor. "Let's go to your room" Benny suggested. "Are you good now" Ethan asked his sister. "ya but it'll cost you" she held out her hand for her payment. Ethan opened his wallet giving her ten dollars hush money. If Jane was blackmailing him then she was fine. They two boys went to Ethan's room. As Benny started to set up the game system he asked Ethan a question. "So do you want to be a good giant or an evil giant"
1231112222.title: Growing and shrinking

12311122221.content: Ethan picked up his controller as he thought of the question asked of him. "I would try to be good" Ethan answered. Benny stopped playing for a second to look at his friend. "You're no fun" he complained. Ethan just laughed as they both played their game. It was a few hours later when they heard a bang at the window. They looked to see Rory hovering outside. Ethan went over to the window opening it to let the vampire in. "So did you save Jane" Rory asked? "No thanks to you" Benny snapped. Rory looked hurt. "Don't be mad at him" Ethan told Benny. Rory grabbed Ethan in a hug lifting him up. "Thanks E." Ethan waited to be put back down. "What do you guys want to do." "I have an idea" Benny started to say. Both the other boys turned to him. "How about both Rory and I spend the night" "Benny you both can't stay over" " What if you grew then held us the shrunk back we would shrink with you" "Wouldn't we be all the same size " Rory looked at both of them confused. "We would be tiny and E here would be his normal size" " We don't even know if it will work" Ethan told Benny.
12311122221.title: Benny's idea

choices: I want us to be 13 feet tall! (As tall as all the ceilings in town)
I want us to be bigger than your house!
123111222212.content: "I've got a MUCH better idea" said Rory. "So what YOUR idea" said Benny, annoyed that Rory didn't seem to like his idea. "If what Benny said IS true, that you can shrink and grow with other people, how about growing us really big? Like, now?!" Rory had a look on his face that showed Ethan he really wanted that. Ethan was thinking it over. He DID enjoy being big, and he may enjoy it even more if his two friends were big with him. "Ok Rory, just let me grow a little bit first" Ethan said with a smile. "Yes!" Rory said while jumping with joy. Benny just stood there happily forgetting the idea HE had before. Ethan then grew slowly until his chin was at Benny's eyes. "B, why DID you grow now?" Benny asked in confusion. "I don't want to be the shortest of the three." Benny understood that now Rory would be the shortest of the three. Rory was to distracted by his own joy that he didn't even hear their conversation. "Rory" said Ethan." "What?" Rory replied in confusion. "Since this WAS, YOUR idea, you should deside what size we should be. With that, Ethan put his hands on Benny and Rory's shoulders. With that question, Rory thought about for only seconds before he gave his answer. "I want us to be....
123111222212.title: Rory's Idea

choices: Benny and Rory want to be mischievious
1231112222122.content: "I want to be bigger than your house" Rory said not even thinking that long about it "Yeah" Benny agreed "It'll be cool to be a giant" "Ok, but first we should go outside so we don't destroy my house" The other two boys looked around as they had completely forgotten that they were in Ethan's bedroom. They were heading downstairs when Jane ran past them. "Tell mom and dad I'm staying at a friends" she ran out the door with her stuff not even acknowledging if her brother even heard her. "Now we don't have to worry about your sister" Benny said. "Come on" Rory grabbed Ethan's arm dragging him out the door. "I want to grow" Benny laughed as he followed his friends out the door. All three went to the back yard Ethan put his hands on both of their shoulders and began to grow. Benny and Rory closed their eyes as the felt Ethan place his hands on them. "I don't feel anything" Rory complained. "Me either" Benny replied. "Just open your eyes" Ethan told them. Rory was the first to open his eyes he looked at his two friends Ahh it didn't work" Benny punched him in the shoulder "Oww" he stepped back rubbing the sore. "We are bigger" Benny huffed in irritation. Rory noticed that all three were around forty feet tall. "This is awesome" Rory yelled. "What do we do now Benny asked both of them.
1231112222122.title: I want us to be bigger than your house!

12311122221221.content: As the three boys were all roughly forty feet tall. It would be hard to keep hidden as no one had noticed Ethan when he was just the lone giant. Which was not that surprising as everything that happened in White chapel was always ignored or completely forgotten days later. Both of the non giant makers decided to head out into the street. "What are two doing" Ethan grabbed Rory holding him back. "We want to explore" Benny said as he turned back to Ethan. "Come on please we promise to behave" Rory whined. Ethan thought about it, it couldn't hurt to have a look around and see the rest of his home town. "OK but be careful" he told them. "We will" they both said cheekily. I'm so going to regret this Ethan thought as he trailed after his two friends.
12311122221221.title: Convincing Ethan

123111222212211.content: Benny was in the lead and come upon a parked car. The car belonged to some bully that had picked on Benny when he was younger. He picked it up easily one handed looking guilty when Ethan and Rory caught up to him. "Hey Benny were you'd get the cool toy car" Rory asked? "It's not a toy, it's someone's actual car" Ethan explained. For a geek Rory sometimes was dumb he shook his head in disbelief. Focusing back on Benny he asked what he was going to do. "I was thinking about putting it on the roof of his house." "That would be cool" Rory went to grab a car for himself. Ethan didn't know what to do, follow Rory or stay with Benny. He decided to follow Rory when he felt his foot hit something. Looking down he saw a person laying on the road. Aaron I so sorry I didn't see you. Ethan was so worried about his two friends that he forgot he was also a danger to the people around him. "How did you three become giants" Aaron picked himself up off the street. Aaron was just a classmate not an enemy but also not a friend. Ethan wondered what to tell him. "I'm not sure it just happened" he lied. "That's cool can I ask a favor" he looked up at Ethan all shyly. Ethan was half expecting him to ask to be a giant too, but what Aaron asked was shocking to the giant seer. "Can you swallow me" "Why would you want that" Ethan was not expecting that. "I've always had a fantasy about being eaten by a giant." The other two giants had noticed that Ethan wasn't hounding them so they had come over to where he was. Rory had a crushed car in his hand while the car Benny was holding was gone. "Hey Aaron" Benny said "What are you doing" Rory asked Ethan? "Aaron want's me to eat him" he told them both. "Lucky" "Awesome" they said. "I don't know if I can eat a human" Ethan felt a bit queasy. "If you don't I will" Benny told him.
123111222212211.title: They are destructive

choices: He's hungry and wants to gorge
1231112222122111.content: Ethan grabbed the smaller boy lifting him up. His two friends watched in rapt attention as they stared at Ethan, both getting excited about what he was about to do. Aaron had closed his eyes in joyful bliss as Ethan was raising him to his mouth. When he stopped moving he opened his eyes. "Are you totally sure you want to do this once I swallow that's it I'll digest you." Ethan told him. "Yes, please I want to offer myself to your glorious body." Benny just pouted whispering under his breath "Why does E always get the best stuff." Rory turned to him " Hey maybe we'll get people giving themselves to us as well" Benny nodded agreement "Maybe Ethan will develop a taste for destruction" They both turned back to said boy. "E he really wants to be eaten by you" Benny told his friend. Ethan looked to Benny then back to Aaron "Last chance" he told him. Aaron gave no indication that he didn't want this to not happen. Ethan raised his hand and slowly fed Aaron into his mouth. It took a few swallows to get him down. Once Aaron's feet had disappeared down Ethan's throat Benny and Rory watched as the lump moved down Ethan's neck and disappear into his chest. Ethan put his finger on his chest following Aaron's descent. "That was weird and still is I can feel him inside of me." "How is it" Rory asked? Ethan thought for a second "it feels awesome I want another one" The two other boys smiled as each other then looked around for more people to feed to Ethan.
1231112222122111.title: The first taste is always the best

12311122221221111.content: Benny thought about a plan he had in his mind. " So how are going to get willing victims for you" he said to Ethan. " And for you and Rory" Ethan told them. Rory smiled. "Yeah" Rory cheered. Benny shook his head "I think you should be the one to eat the people" "Why can't I" Rory asked? " Because Ethan is the only one who has the power to grow or shrink himself and others, and if you don't shut up i'll feed you to him." Rory couldn't believe Benny had threatened him, but Ethan was his friend and wouldn't eat him would he. Turning to Ethan those thoughts were squashed as he saw Ethan looking at him with hunger. "You're not going to eat me are you" he asked scared? Ethan shook his head to clear himself. "No, only if you want me to." Rory grinned in relief noticing that Benny was gone. "Hey E Benny's gone." Ethan looked around noticing Rory was right how did a forty foot teenager slip past the two of them.
12311122221221111.title: The start of a plan

123111222212211112.content: As the two boys were about to search for Benny. The previous missing giant came into view. "Where did you go" Ethan asked? Benny nervously ran his fingers through his hair. "Uh I had to go find some people for you." "Why are acting so strange" Ethan asked suspiciously? Benny didn't want to reveal that he had cast a spell on a group of people that would all offer themselves to Ethan. "I accidentally stepped on a parked car" he told him. "Really, Benny both you and Rory already destroyed a couple of cars" Ethan couldn't believe his friends weird behavior. Rory started to get bored " Come on I want to go this way" he began to move towards the group of people that Benny had put a spell on. The three teens began to move down the street a few people began to notice them and cowardly hid in their homes. "I wonder why they're so afraid of us, it's not like were going to eat them" Benny said. Ethan's stomach rumbled in hunger. Benny looked to his friend maybe he didn't need to cast the spell on the people. The people in question came into view. There was only about seven people . There was a teen girl, an adult male, a teen boy, an older woman, a preteen girl, and two little boys. "Look the man said it's Ethan let us offer ourselves to him." All the people knelt down in offer to the godly boy. Ethan looked at his two friends first in confusion then in joy. One by one the people were picked up and swallowed by Ethan. As the last person found his way sent to Ethan's belly he turned to Benny "Thanks Benny that was great" Benny was confused "Why are you thanking me I didn't do anything" "Sure sure you didn't like I don't know when you're lying or when you put people in a magic trance" Benny was staring at Ethan in shock "And you ate them knowing that they weren't actually offering themselves to you" Ethan just smiled quietly burping. Rory was so lost in his own thoughts that he had missed the conversation that Ethan was going bad.
123111222212211112.title: Ethan is not fooled

choices: He makes it to the stadium
1231112222122111121.content: "I thought you wanted to be good" Benny asked Ethan? "At first I did, but when I swallowed Aaron he was so tasty, and the feeling of him being digested by me was incredible. In fact I figured that you would've eaten some people yourself." " I wanted to corrupt you first" Benny smiled. Ethan smiled back "so that I'm corrupted what do you have in mind" Benny turned to Rory who hadn't been paying attention for awhile. "So Rory, Ethan like's to eat people" Benny told the blond vampire. "Really that's cool" "I was thinking that if we both asked him he could go to the stadium and eat all the people there." Rory's eyes lit up at the thought of Ethan eating all those people at the stadium. "There's like hundreds of people there." " You guys want me to eat the stadium" Ethan asked? Rory turned frowning "I was hoping to beg you" Ethan looked confused "Why did you want to beg me." "I was hoping it would be to much and we would have to convince you" "But I want to do it" Rory looked crestfallen as he wasn't able to talk his friend into doing what his friend was going to do. Rory was a strange boy, but then Benny had an awesome idea. "Hey Rory , the stadium has about a two hundred people at it so Ethan should get bigger" Rory got excited at that " Ethan you should grow bigger" Ethan laughed at his friends at Rory for thinking that it was his idea and at Benny for letting Rory think it was his idea. "OK Rory so how big should I get " "You should be be about two hundred feet" he told him. Ethan nodded at Rory then began to grow. Rory watched as Ethan began to expand upwards and outwards. "Why aren't we also growing to" he asked Benny? "Because he said how big should I get, nothing about all of us, and maybe he wants to be bigger than us." Ethan was amazed at how tiny everything looked when he was twenty feet tall the houses were as tall as him now at two hundred feet they were all below his shins. Looking down he spotted his two friends picking them up in each hand he began to walk to his destination.
1231112222122111121.title: Getting bigger

12311122221221111211.content: At 200 feet tall Ethan held his 40 foot tall friends in his hands. They both seemed to be about 1 foot compared to Ethan. Which meant everyone else was 1 inch tall compared to him. Ethan looked around trying to remember were the stadium was. Lifting his friends up he asked them which way to go. "It's past the skyscrapers" Rory said pointing to the downtown area. Ethan looked over in that direction and began walking. Coming upon the middle of the bustling downtown the sight of a 200 foot teen boy caused a bunch of car accidents and people to start running away. A few people stared in amazement at Ethan just in shock that he was so big. Ethan watched all the little people scurry away from him. It didn't matter one way or another as Ethan had a goal in mind to reach his destination. A few cars and a couple of people were stepped on by the giant teen. "You think they would all not stand in his way" Rory said to Benny. "I think those people wanted to be stepped on" Benny answered. Ethan had heard his two friends and wondered if what Benny said was true. Looking down he saw one tiny person in the middle of the road. Lifting his foot up he held it above the tiny person for a few seconds. When the person didn't run away he realized that what Benny had said was true. So he lowered his foot crushing the person. Crushing was fun but eating was more enjoyable. Making it to the stadium didn't take that long as Rory was right in the direction. Now what to actually do here.
12311122221221111211.title: Onward

123111222212211112112.content: Ethan was still holding his friends when an idea crossed his mind " How would you guys like to be my size." They both nodded yes. Ethan concentrated beginning to grow. Rory looked around at his surroundings as Ethan was still holding him he didn't think it had worked. "Hey it's not working" he yelled up to his giant friend. "Let me try again" he smirked. Ethan closed his eyes thinking about growing again. "It still isn't working" Rory said. Ethan sighed in fake annoyance and grew some more. "I don't think it's working" Rory said disappointed. "Well you stop that, were already five thousand feet" Benny told him. Rory looked down at the far away ground "But were so far from the ground" "That's because Ethan is now four miles tall." Ethan put them both down and Rory saw that what Benny said was true. As the two smaller giants watched the bigger one ripped the stadium out of the ground then swallowed it whole. "Wow that was awesome" Rory said in awe. "I know" Benny said back. Ethan looked back to them "If you want to be my size just ask, just know I'm going to be bigger" Benny turned to Rory "What do you say." Rory answered.
123111222212211112112.title: Clueless Rory

1231112222122111121121.content: "Yes make us your size" Rory told Ethan. Ethan smiled and picked up his two friends. Once again concentrating on his new developed growth powers. When he was done Benny and Rory were both 4 miles tall, but as Ethan was still holding them he was 20 miles. "Could you put us down" Rory asked. "Sure" Ethan gently placed his friends on the ground. The two smaller giants looked around at the city below them sprawled out on the ground. Benny stepped on a city block crushing houses under his massive foot. "oops" Benny grinned at the destruction he caused. Rory playfully pushed Benny over, causing the boy to crush a whole bunch of buildings. Benny picked himself up "Why'd you do that " he asked. Rory laughed "I thought we could wrestle" "Then why didn't you just ask" "It was more fun this way" Ethan just watched his friends grapple with each other as they crushed buildings cars and people under their massive bodies. Ethan started to feel left out as he couldn't wrestle with his two friends. Well he could but it would be unfair as he was five times bigger. But then again.
1231112222122111121121.title: Playing around

12311122221221111211211.content: Ethan made up his mind he wanted to join his friends in the fun so he made himself go down to 4 miles. He saw that Rory had Benny pinned down, more like trying to pin him as Benny was struggling to get up. Placing his hands on Rory's shoulder Rory turned his head to see who had grabbed him as he thought that only Benny was his size. Smiling when he realized it was Ethan he got up from Benny stepping away from him. Ethan gave his hand to Benny to grab. As Benny grabbed his hand, Ethan helped him up as the two boys stood Benny smiled at the shaggy haired giant then pushed him. The action took Ethan totally by surprise so he fell into a sitting position crushing a few houses under his butt. Getting up he ran and tackled Benny causing both of them to smash into some skyscrapers. Both boys spent their time not trying to pin the other one, as they both liked it when the other caused them to crush the buildings under their massive bodies. "Hey you're not doing it right" Rory said when noticed what they both were doing. Ethan was straddling Benny and Benny was about to push him off when he turned to Rory "What do you mean" he asked innocently? "You both could have won ages ago" Rory said slightly miffed at the both of them. Ethan sat down on Benny's legs listening to the two of them talk. "The reason why I haven't pinned Ethan is because he's a god" Benny explained. "But you're the one who gave me this power" Ethan said touched by his friends adoration of him. "In fact it would be a great honor to be eaten or crushed by you" Benny said looking into Ethan's eyes. Rory thought about what Benny said it was fun being a giant yet if Ethan wanted to do to him what Benny said he would welcome it. "Benny's right you are a god to both of us whatever you want to do is fine with us"
12311122221221111211211.title: Ethan joins in

123111222212211112112111.content:
Ethan liked what his friends were saying about him. The fact that he could change his size at will was an awesome power, yet he wanted more. Grabbing Benny's head in his hands he telepathically entered his mind. "What's going on" Benny asked when he noticed that they were both standing and that Rory was gone. "We're in your mind" Ethan told him. "Why are you rooting around in my head"
"I wish to become god like" Ethan stated. "Uh dude you are god like, you're four miles tall at the moment" Ethan smiled "I would like to take your power of magic." Benny just stared at his best friend "What do you mean take my powers." "Exactly what I said." Benny took a breath thinking about what Ethan had said. Ethan was much smarter and would most likely be able to wield the powers better than him. "I'll let you take them if you wish." Ethan walked up to Benny placing his hand on Benny's face he began to draw out the powers. Benny was quite powerful or rather he had lots of untapped potential. Ethan was amazed at all the power that
Benny contained. When it was done Benny knelt down in front of Ethan "Is my god pleased" Ethan pulled Benny into a hug "Yes thank you so much" "I would do anything for you" Benny whispered. "I know we're in your mind I've looked through your memories and feelings even the ones you keep hidden from yourself." Ethan stopped the connection so that both boys were still in their original position with Ethan straddling Benny's legs. "What was going on, I saw a white light go from Benny to Ethan" Rory said. Benny delicately brushed Ethan's cheek with his fingertips being gentle as if the boy would vanish and maybe he could now. Ethan got up and walked over to Rory. With Benny he was gentle kind, but with Rory he took what he wanted. Grabbing Rory he took his strength his flight and his immortality. Lets face it what's the point of being a god if you can't live forever. He did leave both of his friends their original powers as that was apart of them and if he took it all he would kill them. Of course both would have let him if he wished to. Now with both of his friends power magnified by his own natural powers he was a god.
123111222212211112112111.title: The Deification of Ethan Morgan

choices: Benny wants to play a game
1231112222122111121121111.content: The new god was wondering what to do with his powers. His original power was his seer ability which allowed him to see the past present and future. Pointing to the destroyed city he rebuilt the entire city and brought all the people the three of them had killed back to life. "What just happened" Benny asked as the formerly destroyed buildings seemed to rebuild themselves magically. Except where the three were standing. "I can bring the city back after it's destroyed so we can play as long as we want to, and do whatever we want as much as possible" Rory squealed in delight and began to crush buildings looking down at his feet at the tiny people scurrying around. Ethan smirked at his friends fun. "So you can just bring it back" Benny questioned? Ethan looked back to Benny as had been watching Rory pick up some buses and drop the people in his mouth. "You're right they do taste good" the blonde said grinning. "Yes I can just keep bringing it back" "And anyone who dies" Benny asked? "Yes" Ethan answered knowing where the questions were leading to. "Even me and Rory" "Of course" Ethan answered. "Would we remember it" "Only if I wanted you to" "That's cool, hey guess what" Benny shoved Ethan and ran off "tag you're it." Ethan smiled and ran after Benny both boys pulverizing the poor city under their colossal feet . Rory soon joined in the game. The three boys had so much fun tagging each other and knowingly that their simple game was causing massive destruction to the city was the icing on the cake. And Benny thought to himself with Ethan's new powers they could play forever without ever running out of things to destroy.
1231112222122111121121111.title: Awesome powers

12311122221221111211211111.content: After the entire city was flattened, the three colossal teens all relaxed together by sitting on its remains. Benny turned to Ethan "I have an idea for a game." "You want me to return you and Rory to your normal size when I remake the city, so that I can stomp around it with you running away" Ethan told him. Benny was shocked that Ethan knew exactly what he wanted. "It wasn't that hard to know where your mind was going" Ethan added. "So what are the rules of this game" Rory piped in. The two dark haired boys looked at him then each other. "It's your game you decide the rules" Ethan told Benny. Benny pursed his lips as he rubbed his head in thought. "First things if you kill us you win" Benny started. "Obviously" "And you have to be two hundred feet tall, no growing so big that you could use one foot to step on the city" Ethan smiled at that as the thought did briefly cross his mind. "So if we get killed Ethan wins, but how do we win" Rory asked? "If we are able to survive for two hours then we win" "How about make it five hours we have five lives each and each time Ethan kills us he gets bigger" Rory suggested. "I like that" Ethan said. "Me too" Benny agreed at Rory's idea.
12311122221221111211211111.title: Benny wants to play a game

123111222212211112112111111.content:
There was a blinding bright flash of light that blinded Benny and Rory. The both found themselves in the middle of the downtown area. The people around them all went about their lives unaware that they had all been dead a few minuets ago. "Should we stay together or separate" Rory said as he and Benny walked on the sidewalk both looking around. "We should stick together" Benny told him. "That way we can help each other" he added. "That sounds like a plan" Rory said agreeing. He looked around at the buildings "Where is he, it shouldn't be this hard to spot a 200 foot giant" Rory complained. Right as he said those words a giant foot came crashing down a foot right in front of them. "Wow" Rory looked up at Ethan forgetting that he was suppose to flee. When he turned back to Benny he saw Benny running away. He didn't even have time to feel betrayed as a dark shadow enveloped him. Looking up he saw the underside of Ethan's shoe as it rushed towards him. Benny had tried to get Rory's attention but he didn't seem to notice. So Benny left him, when he felt Ethan step down he turned back watching as Ethan doubled in size to 400 feet. If Ethan doubled each time it was going to be hard to win the game and only fifteen minuets had passed since it began.

Ethan had easily found his friends as they were conversing. Stepping down in front he watched as Benny tried to get Rory's attention then failing that ran away. Shaking his head at Rory's stupidity he promptly stepped on him. He felt himself grow to 400 feet. Looking at the street in front of him he shoved the building on his left in the direction that Benny had ran. the building toppled over into the next one causing the next and the next to fall over. Watching the ground as the buildings fell over he saw a group of people fleeing in terror. He spotted Benny away from the crowd. Ethan figured that maybe Benny had decided not to follow the crowd as Benny probably figured that he would be drawn to all the people. Ethan watched as Benny was in a parking lot. Which didn't have any cars in it. Ethan quickly grabbed Benny lifting him up. He had a hard time on deciding on what to do. He then decided to put him under his arm. Holding him there he lowered his arm till he felt Benny being crushed in his pit. His body vanished then he grew to 800 feet.
123111222212211112112111111.title: The Game

1231112222122111121121111111.content: Ethan knew he would win the game as he was already 800 feet tall and would get even bigger. He had made it so every time that Benny or Rory were killed they would re spawn in one of a few places Which one they were sent to Ethan didn't know as that would be cheating. He suddenly had the urge to go pee. Looking around he noticed the swimming center. Walking over he ripped off the building from the ground leaving the pools. Unzipping his pants he aimed down and used the pools as his own toilet. His urine filled all the pools within thirty seconds. After he was done he shook himself off and zipped up. He then felt himself growing. Reaching 3200 feet he realized that he had pissed on both of them. Deciding to head towards the school he felt a small crunch under his sneaker. He then grew to 12800 feet, what were the odds that both Rory and Benny would be right in front of him. He looked at his watch and noticed that only one hour had passed since they had started. And Benny and Rory were left with only 2 lives each. Yeah he would definitely win.
